Фамильный герб; узор, рисунок

Мнемоника

Узор 文, вышитый нитками 糸.

Варианты

heisig_chinese_memo: Who knew that Spiderman was Scottish! He has sewn his family crest design onto his uniform.
heisig_constituent: family crest, thread, spiderman, sentence, plaid, kilt, Billy Connolly
koohiiStory1: The Scottish weave their family crests with thread on plaid fabric.
koohiiStory2: A family crest sown on to a garment with thread sometimes has a Latin sentence as a motto.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You use thread and writing to sew our family crest. You've been sewing your family crest since you were a kid, you could do it today with your eyes closed.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the thread slowing forming the writing that makes up your family crest. You're making a scarf with your crest on it. It's like a wizarding school house symbol.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your family crest is of a monster! And the writing says "Our Family Monster."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: What kind of monster is on your family crest? Picture it in your mind right now. Now tweet to us @wanikaniapp because I really want to know what you came up with!!
Ru_Radicals: 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 文 (литература), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thread (糸) running through your literature (文) is the family crest
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The highlander helps spidey to design a new version of his costume with Scottish kilt patterns.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "糸" and "文", the original meaning is a pattern embroidered on silk fabrics. "New Book of Tang Dynasty-Geography Five": "Huaiji County, Yuezhou, Central Dudu Mansion. Tugong: Treasure flower patterns, etc., white braided and shuttle ten patterns and other silk."

" Texture " can generally refer to wrinkles or lines on other items. Emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty "Xiaochi Fu": "The pattern of overlapping wind continues to repeat, and it turns back and forth in a complex song."

" Texture " can also fingerprint silver. Qing Li Yu's "Flounder: Lei Lei": "I didn't spend a single bit of effort for Qian Wanguan. I got three hundred taels of real patterns. I got my hands tight and got hooked."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "糸" and "文", the original meaning is a pattern embroidered on silk.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「文」聲，本義為絲織品上織繡的花紋。《新唐書‧地理志五》：「越州會稽郡，中都督府。土貢：寶花花紋等羅，白編交梭十樣花紋等綾。」

　　「紋」可泛指其他物品上的皺痕或紋路。唐太宗〈小池賦〉：「疊風紋兮連復連，折迴流兮曲復曲。」

　　「紋」還可指紋銀。清李漁《比目魚‧征利》：「我為錢萬貫這樁事情，不曾費一毫氣力，三百兩真紋，弄上了手，也勾得緊了。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「文」聲，本義為絲織品上織繡的花紋。

從「 糸 」，「 文 」聲，本義為絲織品上織繡的花紋。《新唐書‧地理志五》：「越州會稽郡，中都督府。土貢：寶花花紋等羅，白編交梭十樣花紋等綾。」 「 紋 」可泛指其他物品上的皺痕或紋路。唐太宗〈小池賦〉：「疊風紋兮連復連，折迴流兮曲復曲。」 「 紋 」還可指紋銀。清李漁《比目魚‧征利》：「我為錢萬貫這樁事情，不曾費一毫氣力，三百兩真紋，弄上了手，也勾得緊了。」
From the sound of " 糸" and " 文", the original meaning is a pattern embroidered on silk fabrics. "New Book of Tang Dynasty-Geography Five": "Huaiji County, Yuezhou, Central Dudu Mansion. Tugong: Treasure flower patterns, etc., white braided and shuttle ten patterns and other silk." " Texture" can generally refer to wrinkles or lines on other items. Emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty "Xiaochi Fu": "The pattern of overlapping wind continues to repeat, and it turns back and forth in a complex song." " Texture" can also fingerprint silver. Qing Li Yu's "Flounder: Lei Lei": "I didn't spend a single bit of effort for Qian Wanguan. I got three hundred taels of real patterns. I got my hands tight and got hooked."

Radicals: 糸, 文  (thread, writing)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use thread and writing to sew our family crest. You've been sewing your family crest since you were a kid, you could do it today with your eyes closed.
Imagine the thread slowing forming the writing that makes up your family crest. You're making a scarf with your crest on it. It's like a wizarding school house symbol.
Reading Mnemonic
Your family crest is of a monster! And the writing says "Our Family Monster."
What kind of monster is on your family crest? Picture it in your mind right now. Now tweet to us @wanikaniapp because I really want to know what you came up with!!
